headline.main: HEALTH: Nutrition; Diet Higher in Fat May Help Adult Diabetics, Study Shows

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A new study suggests that the diet usually recommended for patients with the most common form of adult diabetes may be less effective in protecting health than a diet that allows greater consumption of unsaturated fats.
docs.snippet: LEAD: A new study suggests that the diet usually recommended for patients with the most common form of adult diabetes may be less effective in protecting health than a diet that allows greater consumption of unsaturated fats.
